snippet: Speaking near Kabul after a surprise night visit to Afghanistan on the anniversary of Osama bin Laden’s death, President Obama said that “we have a clear path to fulfill our mission in Afghanistan.”
lead_paragraph: Speaking near Kabul after a surprise night visit to Afghanistan on the anniversary of Osama bin Laden’s death, President Obama said that “we have a clear path to fulfill our mission in Afghanistan.”

headline.seo: President Obama Visits Kabul to Sign Partnership with Afghanistan
headline.main: In Speech, Obama Says U.S. Will Stand by Afghans After Troop Withdrawal
headline.print_headline: Obama, in Surprise Visit to Kabul, Says U.S. Will Stand by Afghans After Troop Withdrawal
